subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Kei Nishikori of Japan, an 18-year-old qualifier, reached his first ATP final by beating the third-seeded Sam Querrey, 4-6, 6-2, 7-6 (7), at the International Tennis Championships in Delray Beach, Fla. Nishikori will play James Blake, a 6-4, 6-4 winner over Robby Ginepri, in the final.
